default.question: When can I cancel?
default.answer__limio_richtext:
You can cancel your membership at any time, and we’ll take no more payments.


Monthly

You are charged monthly on a rolling basis. For example if you have paid £7.99 for your first month and you cancel, this will cancel all future payments.


Annual

You are charged annually on a rolling basis. For example if you have paid £79 for your first year and you cancel, this will cancel all future payments.


In either case, you are entitled to an initial 14 day cooling off period when you can request a refund - read more.

default.question: How can I cancel?
default.answer__limio_richtext: Call 02921 682114 or email or write to our customer service centre in Cardiff with your name and membership number.

default.question: Do you have a trial?
default.answer__limio_richtext:
If you are looking to try Which? For a single review or just generally you can get your first month for £5.


Cancel anytime and we’ll take no more payments.

default.question: Can I give a Which? Subscription as a gift?
default.answer__limio_richtext:
Yes we offer gift subscriptions over the phone.


Please call 02921 682114 and ask for a gift subscription and we will be happy to help.

default.question: Do you offer legal or consumer advice?
default.answer__limio_richtext:
Buying advice


We offer 1-1 buying advice with our full access subscription.


Consumer advice


We offer free and impartial advice on Legal and consumer issues


via our consumer rights hub.


Legal


We offer tailored, affordable advice from our experts at Which? Legal.

default.question: What are the Which? Apps compatible with?
default.answer__limio_richtext:
The Which app is available on both the Apple App store and Google Play store.


iPhone - Requires iOS 11.0 or later.


iPad - Requires iPadOS 11.0 or later.


iPod touch - Requires iOS 11.0 or later.


Mac - Requires macOS 11.0 or later and a Mac with the Apple M1 chip.

The Which Magazine app is available on both the Apple App store and Google Play store.


iPhone - Requires iOS 11.0 or later.


iPad - Requires iPadOS 11.0 or later.


iPod touch - Requires iOS 11.0 or later.


Mac - Requires macOS 11.0 or later and a Mac with the Apple M1 chip.

limioProps.label: FAQ Notice
limioProps.default: If you have any further questions please contact Which? Customer support. We’ll get back to you between 8:30am-6pm weekdays and 9am-1pm Saturdays.
